WaterbottleFull.name: Water Bottle (Full)
WaterbottleFull.description: A stone bottle, full of water.

WaterbottleHalf.name: Water Bottle (Half-Full)
WaterbottleHalf.description: A stone bottle, half-filled with water.

Rope.name: Old Rope
Rope.description: About 10m of old fibre rope. It looks weak.

CarvedToy.name: Carved Half-Light Toy
CarvedToy.description: A toy carved from wood depicting a half-light. The creatures digust me, but the item still holds sentimental value.

Torch.name: Glow Rod
Torch.description: A glowing crystal rod. I can use it for illumination. This one is the common type: has a deep red tint.

Food.name: Canned Food
Food.description: Several cans of rather tasty cured fish.

SleepingBag.name: Shielded Sleeping Bag
SleepingBag.description: A sleeping bag with neurological shielding. The old man at the crossroads insisted it would be vital out in the wilderness at night.
